A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is rare\, and rather unsettling\, that I am with the 'professional critics' on this one. I saw The Last Jedi on opening night and was 100% entertained. It is not a perfect film\, but none of the Star Wars movies are. In short\, it was worth the price of admission...and given today's climate of near-miss ventures by the major studios\, that is saying a lot.\nThis franchise just got interesting. \nFor all you haters out there:  here's a tissue.
